channel.title: !rainbow six vegas!
channel.description: hey, if anyone here plays rainbow six vegas and is elite, and will let me borrow their elite account for about 10 minutes please post, i really wanna make my guy elite!!! please![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 17, 2007, 05:56:20 PM[/size][hr]please someone let me use a high account ill pay them rs gp!
